hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #6# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #village well# leads to the #Kokiri Shop#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #King Dodongo# holds...^ #Deku Nut Capacity# and #the Ice Arrows#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Requiem of Spirit#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #9# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Early Gibdos Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Minuet of Forest#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Big Poe Bottle# and #Deku Nut Capacity#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Did you know that you can reach the invisible Hookshot target before the fans room in Shadow Temple with just the Hookshot if you backflip onto the chest?

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of #time#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #time#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Blue Potion Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Wind Hint Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Minuet of Forest#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: Did you know that the Discord server has a public Plandomizer library?

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Hover Boots Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
